headline.main: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case
headline.print_headline: WBC Hands Povetkin Suspension, $250,000 Fine in Doping Case

lead_paragraph: Sen. Claire McCaskill was one of many Democrats taking umbrage at the revelation that Attorney General Jeff Sessions had twice met with the Russian ambassador to the U.S. during last year's presidential campaign, during a furor over that country's alleged interference in the election, and misled his colleagues about it during his confirmation hearing.
